item.title: HELP will REP++
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

Okay so i’m trying to add this Interface but it wont show up. I’m not very good with interfaces I really don’t see how they work, but i’m trying. So what I need help with is this. I want to make the interface to pop up when I do ::interface 9460 just to see that it works. I tried doing that command with other ones and it worked so yeah. This is my code that I put in RSInterface.java public static void vShop(RSFont[] rsFonts){ RSInterface Interface = addTabInterface(9460); setChildren(12, Interface); addSprite(9461, 0, "User/VOTE"); addHover(9462, 3, 0, 8463, 1, "Bank/BANK", 17, 17, "Close Shop!"); addHovered(9463, 2, "Bank2/BANK", 17, 17, 3827); addButton(9466, 1, "User/VOTE", 95, 19, "Buy Pak Yak Pouch (10Points)", 1); addButton(9467, 2, "User/VOTE", 95, 19, "Buy Spirit Terrorbird Pouch (10Points)", 1); addButton(9468, 3, "User/VOTE", 95, 19, "Buy Steel Titan Pouch (10Points)", 1); addButton(9469, 4, "User/VOTE", 95, 19, "Buy 3rd Age Mage Hat (50Points)", 1); addButton(9470, 5, "User/VOTE", 95, 19, "Buy 3rd Age Robe Top (50Points)", 1); addButton(9471, 6, "User/VOTE", 95, 19, "Buy 3rd Age Robe Bottom (50Points)", 1); addButton(9472, 7, "User/VOTE", 95, 19, "Buy Dark Bow (70Points)", 1); addButton(9473, 8, "User/VOTE", 95, 19, "Buy Dragon Claws (70Points)", 1); addButton(9474, 9, "User/VOTE", 95, 19, "Buy Dragonfire Shield (70Points)", 1); setBounds(9461, 12, 12, 0, Interface); setBounds(9462, 471, 22, 1, Interface); setBounds(9463, 471, 22, 2, Interface); setBounds(9466, 27, 125, 3, Interface);//this is where it starts setBounds(9467, 127, 125, 4, Interface); setBounds(9468, 226, 125, 5, Interface); setBounds(9469, 27, 205, 6, Interface); setBounds(9470, 127, 205, 7, Interface); setBounds(9471, 226, 205, 8, Interface); setBounds(9472, 27, 285, 9, Interface); setBounds(9473, 126, 285, 10, Interface); setBounds(9474, 227, 285, 11, Interface);//this is where it ends }
I get no compiling errors at all but as I said it doesn’t show up. Am I forgetting to put another kind of code somewhere? As I said i’m new to interfaces.
-If there’s anything else that you guys need to know to help me please comment. I will respond super fast.

Read full topic
